changeSet.author: vasil
changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE IF NOT EXISTS hibernate_sequence

changeSet.author: vasil
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rate ( id BIGINT NOT NULL, number_of_evaluations INT NOT NULL, one INT NOT NULL, two INT NOT NULL, three INT NOT NULL, four INT NOT NULL, five INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) )

changeSet.author: vasil
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS questionDao ( id BIGINT NOT NULL, is_deleted BOOL NOT NULL, text VARCHAR(255), rate_id BIGINT, PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (rate_id) REFERENCES rate(id) )

changeSet.author: vasil
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO questionDao VALUES (1, false, 'first questionDao', 1)
